Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-orange pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and grey and pink in section, the interior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of a red-painted sign, the exterior is also covered with a light-brown slip and faint traces of a red-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394186) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394186)
